Comment.val: /*Batchserver enabled process to send TOSA-calculation messages */

Text.val: Only correct the number in the jobmonitor when not all messages could be sent!
Do not correct in case more messages than expected have been sent (v_TotalNumberOfMessages<0), because this
could lead to the final report not beeing printed at all, since the Jobmonitor won't recognize the job is finished!
No error occured during processing, then less messages than expected are sent:
An error occured, than the processing is stopped immediately skipping the rest of the messages:
To be able to recognize failures, the number of processed items won't reach the number of
expected ones, so the job must be finished by hand.

ExpSyntax.val: 'Selection : '&UnicodeChr(HVal('000D'))& 'Is Termination: '&IF({0,1981808672},'Yes','No')&UnicodeChr(HVal('000D'))& 'Skip Calculated: '&IF({0,1981808673},'Yes','No')&UnicodeChr(HVal('000D'))& 'Tax Year: '&Trim(Str({0,28},VarPic('{0,28}'VAR,0)))&UnicodeChr(HVal('000D'))& 'Calculation Date Range: '&Trim(DStr({0,1981808670},VarPic('{0,1981808670}'VAR,0)))&' - '&Trim(DStr({0,1981808671},VarPic('{0,1981808671}'VAR,0)))&UnicodeChr(HVal('000D'))& 'Client Range: '&Trim(Str({0,1},VarPic('{0,1}'VAR,0)))&' - '&Trim(Str({0,5},VarPic('{0,5}'VAR,0)))&UnicodeChr(HVal('000D'))& 'Product Range: '&Trim(Str({0,3},VarPic('{0,3}'VAR,0)))&' - '&Trim(Str({0,4},VarPic('{0,4}'VAR,0)))&UnicodeChr(HVal('000D'))& 'ProductSequence Range: '&Trim(Str({0,1981808676},VarPic('{0,1981808676}'VAR,0)))&' - '&Trim(Str({0,1981808677},VarPic('{0,1981808677}'VAR,0)))

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT COUNT(*) from ( SELECT p.ppr_id "PPR_ID" FROM producten_per_relatie p INNER JOIN rekeningen_per_product rp ON rp.rpp_productnummer = p.ppr_productnummer AND rp.rpp_volgnr_per_product = p.ppr_volgnr_per_product AND rp.rpp_relatienummer = p.ppr_relatienummer AND rp.rpp_rekeningsoort BETWEEN 100 AND 999 AND rp.rpp_valuta = ' ' INNER JOIN rekeningen re ON re.re_nummer = p.ppr_relatienummer AND re.re_rekening = rp.rpp_rekening_nummer AND re.re_soort = rp.rpp_rekeningsoort AND re.re_muntsoort = rp.rpp_valuta LEFT OUTER JOIN TOSA_ACCOUNT_TERMINATION t on t.tnhd_ppr_id = p.ppr_id WHERE p.ppr_relatienummer BETWEEN ~1 AND ~2 AND p.ppr_productnummer = ~3 AND ( ~4 = 0 OR p.ppr_volgnr_per_product BETWEEN ~5 AND ~6 ) AND ( ~7 = 0 OR NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tosa_calc_header c WHERE c.parent_ppr_id = p.ppr_id AND c.tax_year = ~8 ) ) AND ( t.tnst_date is null OR t.tnst_date >= to_date(~9,'YYYYMMDD') ) AND re.re_openingsdatum <= ~10
-- A holder must be present AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM holders_per_product h WHERE h.hpp_relatienummer = p.ppr_relatienummer AND h.hpp_product = p.ppr_productnummer AND h.hpp_product_volgnr = p.ppr_volgnr_per_product ) )

Text.valUnicode: RAPPORT TOSA CALCULATIE BERICHTEN PER PRODUCT
Geen gegevens aanwezig om te verwerken!

ExpSyntax.val: StrBuild(MlsTrans('Er zijn @1@ berichten meer verstuurd dan vooraf bepaald! 1 of meer calculaties verschijnen mogelijk niet op het eindrapport!'),Trim(Str(ABS({1,68157481}),VarPic('{1,68157481}'VAR,0))))

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT p.ppr_id "PPR_ID" FROM producten_per_relatie p INNER JOIN rekeningen_per_product rp ON rp.rpp_productnummer = p.ppr_productnummer AND rp.rpp_volgnr_per_product = p.ppr_volgnr_per_product AND rp.rpp_relatienummer = p.ppr_relatienummer AND rp.rpp_rekeningsoort BETWEEN 100 AND 999 AND rp.rpp_valuta = ' ' INNER JOIN rekeningen re ON re.re_nummer = p.ppr_relatienummer AND re.re_rekening = rp.rpp_rekening_nummer AND re.re_soort = rp.rpp_rekeningsoort AND re.re_muntsoort = rp.rpp_valuta LEFT OUTER JOIN TOSA_ACCOUNT_TERMINATION t on t.tnhd_ppr_id = p.ppr_id WHERE p.ppr_relatienummer BETWEEN ~1 AND ~2 AND p.ppr_productnummer = ~3 AND ( ~4 = 0 OR p.ppr_volgnr_per_product BETWEEN ~5 AND ~6 ) AND ( ~7 = 0 OR NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tosa_calc_header c WHERE c.parent_ppr_id = p.ppr_id AND c.tax_year = ~8 ) ) AND ( t.tnst_date is null OR t.tnst_date >= to_date(~9,'YYYYMMDD') ) AND re.re_openingsdatum <= ~10
-- A holder must be present AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM holders_per_product h WHERE h.hpp_relatienummer = p.ppr_relatienummer AND h.hpp_product = p.ppr_productnummer AND h.hpp_product_volgnr = p.ppr_volgnr_per_product )

Text.val: Message successfully sent then lower the total number of requests (to be send):

ExpSyntax.val: StrBuild(MlsTrans('Aanmaken tosaCalculation verzoek voor relatie @1@ product @2@ is mislukt. @3@ records zijn niet verwerkt!'),Trim(Str({0,1},'')),Trim(Str({0,2},'')),Trim(Str({1,68157481},VarPic('{1,68157481}'VAR,0))))
MlsTrans('Er zijn mogelijk 1 of meer records niet verwerkt!')
